timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -36,21 +37,37 @@
 		keyName = "tickCount",
 		name = "Tick count",
 		description = "Configures the tick on which a sound will be played",
-		position = 2
+		position = 0
 	)
 	default int tickCount()
 	{
 		return 1;
 	}
 
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "tickVolume",
+		name = "Tick Volume",
+		description = "Configures the volume of the tick sound",
+		position = 1
+	)
+	default MetronomeVolume tickVolume() { return MetronomeVolume.MEDIUM_HIGH; }

-package net.runelite.client.plugins.metronome;
-
-import net.runelite.api.SoundEffectVolume;
-import lombok.Getter;
-import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
-
-@Getter
-@RequiredArgsConstructor
-public enum MetronomeVolume
-{
-	LOW("Low", SoundEffectVolume.LOW),
-	MEDIUM_LOW("Medium-Low", SoundEffectVolume.MEDIUM_LOW),
-	MEDIUM_HIGH("Medium-High", SoundEffectVolume.MEDIUM_HIGH),
-	HIGH("High", SoundEffectVolume.HIGH);
-
-	private final String name;
-	private final int volume;
-
-	@Override
-	public String toString()
-	{
-		return name;
-	}
-}
